_move_speed: Keyboard / Mousekey moving speed when moving the player in km/s
_mousewheel_move_speed: Distance to move each time the mouse wheel is moved in km
_keyoard_rotate_speed: Rotation speed for numpad keys, in radians per second
_enable_anaglyph: Sets whether anaglyph mode is enabled or not
_anaglyph_intensity: Intensity of 'sticking out' effect in anaglyph mode
_skybox_depth: Intensity of skybox depth impression in anaglyph mode
_anaglyph_eyedist: Distance between eyes when using anaglyph mode, in km
_music_volume: Volume of the background music, 1.0 is default gain
_seed: Seed used for random numbers, e.g. in shaders
_prerotate_planets: Pre-rotate planets so they are not in one line when the game starts
